mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PROFESSOR (PROFNO, NAME, BIRTHDATE, ADDRESS, GENDER, TEL, HIREDATE, SAL, POSITION, DEPTNO, EMAIL) VALUES (#{profno}, #{name}, #{birthdate}, #{address}, #{gender}, #{tel}, sysdate, #{sal}, #{position}, #{deptno}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PROFNO, P.NAME, P.BIRTHDATE, P.ADDRESS, P.GENDER, P.TEL, P.HIREDATE, P.SAL, P.POSITION, P.DEPTNO, D.NAME dname, P.EMAIL AS EMAIL FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT D CROSS JOIN TBL_PROFESSOR P WHERE D.DEPTNO = P.DEPTNO

SELECT P.PROFNO, P.NAME, PASSWORD, P.BIRTHDATE, P.ADDRESS, P.GENDER, P.TEL, P.HIREDATE, P.SAL, P.POSITION, P.DEPTNO, D.NAME dname, P.EMAIL AS EMAIL FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT D JOIN TBL_PROFESSOR P on D.DEPTNO = P.DEPTNO JOIN TBL_PROF_ACCOUNT A ON P.PROFNO = A.PROFNO where P.PROFNO = #{profno}
select count(*) from tbl_student s join tbl_professor p on s.profno = p.profno where p.profno = #{profno}
select count(*) from tbl_course co join tbl_professor p on co.profno = p.profno where p.profno = #{profno}
select count(*) from tbl_course co left join tbl_professor p on co.profno = p.profno join tbl_correction cor on co.coursno = cor.coursno where co.profno = #{profno} and cor.status = 0
